tns:patch.author: acartaleanu
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_grace_period AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, fund.grace_period, fund.amp_donor_org_id, fund.type_of_assistance_category_va as terms_assist_id, fund.financing_instr_category_value as financing_instrument_id, fund.amp_donor_org_id as donor_org_id, fund.mode_of_payment_category_va as mode_of_payment_id, fund.funding_status_category_va as funding_status_id, fund.agreement as agreement_id, fund.amp_funding_id as funding_id FROM amp_activity_version a JOIN amp_funding fund ON fund.amp_activity_id = a.amp_activity_id WHERE fund.grace_period IS NOT NULL
